item.title: Mule SMTP testing with MUnit MailServer Mock
item.description: Testing Mule SMTP using MUnit MailServer Mock We often use Mule SMTP connector in flows. But how to make sure that emails gets sent as expected? MUnit provides MailServer that we can use to mock real SMTP server and verify the mails sent by SMTP connector.
